He said he wants to remain in private life although he is happy to be an informal Barack Obamaial adviser. The administration knows that I am quite content with the work I am doing now, he said. Allen Iverson returned to the game. Rasheed Wallace 's 3-pointer with 10.4 seconds left ended a nEarl Watsony 7-minute scoring drought. Richard Hamilton 's two free throws with 3.8 seconds to go avoided a monumental collapse from a 29-point third-quarter lead. Honestly, I didn't want to go back in, said Allen Iverson , who scored 20 points through three quarters. "I felt that our second team should have closed that thing out." for New York's junior senator, Kirsten Gillibrand , since her friend Rep. Gabrielle Giffords was gunned down in Arizona. But one thing that hasn't changed for the Democrat is that she feels comfortable in her state. I'm not worried about my safety, and I feel very safe everywhere in our state, and I feel safe doing my job, Kirsten Gillibrand said after visiting Gabrielle Giffords yesterday and seeing the remarkable strides she's made since a lunatic turned a mundane supermarket meet-and-greet into a scene of horror. I'm not committed to a Republican candidate," Colin Powell told CNN Chief Political Correspondent Candy Crowley . I am not committed to any candidate until I see all the candidates and finally see who the two candidates are who are going for this position.
